nodes.text: Lerct was a terrestrial astronomical object in the galaxy, home to the Arhul Hextrophon School of Embedded Journalism and the Lerct Historical Institute. It was the homeworld of the human Beaumont Kin, who worked as a professor at the Lerct Historical Institute before joining the Resistance after the Hosnian Cataclysm.

Lerct was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2019 reference book Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary, written by Pablo Hidalgo. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Lerct was first mentioned in Alliance Intelligence Reports, a supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game published in 1995.
